trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the endpoints for a service.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含服务的终结点的集合。

trans-unit.source: This collection of endpoints for a service is used by the metadata API to manage services with multiple endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 元数据 API 使用的服务终结点的此集合来管理与多个终结点的服务。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection> is returned, for example, by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Endpoints%2A> property and by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter.ImportAllEndpoints%2A> method when creating service endpoints from WSDL port types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection> 返回，例如，通过<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription.Endpoints%2A>属性和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter.ImportAllEndpoints%2A>方法从 WSDL 端口类型创建服务终结点时。

trans-unit.source: The collection provides the functionality to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> the endpoints of a particular type, that have a specific name or address, or to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> of the endpoints for a service that meet a specified contract type or name criteria.
trans-unit.target: 该集合可提供一种功能，即 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> 拥有特定名称或地址的特殊类型终结点，或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> 满足指定协定类型或名称条件的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> methods to enumerate <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects that satisfy various search criteria.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示了如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> 方法来枚举满足多种搜索条件的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first service endpoint found that satisfies specific criteria from the collection of service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 返回从服务终结点集合中找到的第一个满足特定条件的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: There are potentially multiple endpoints that could satisfy the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 满足条件的服务终结点可能有多个。

trans-unit.source: The method returns the first one encountered in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 该方法会返回在集合中找到的第一个满足条件的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: If you need to find all of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects that satisfy the specified criteria, use one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要查找所有满足指定条件的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 对象，则可使用任一 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of contract for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服务终结点的协定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first service endpoint found that satisfies the specified contract type from the collection of service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 返回从服务终结点集合中找到的第一个满足指定协定类型的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> of the specified contract type or <see langword="null" /> if none was found.
trans-unit.target: 第一个满足指定协定类型条件的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />，如果找不到，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%28System.Type%29> overload is specific to the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] programming model.
trans-unit.target: 此 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%28System.Type%29> 重载特定于 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 编程模式。

trans-unit.source: It looks at the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.ContractType%2A> property for each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 它会查看每个终结点的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.ContractType%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.ContractType%2A> may be `null` if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> was not created from the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] programming model (types with *Contract attributes).
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.ContractType%2A> 不是从 `null` 编程模式创建的（类型带有 *协定属性），则 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> 将可能为 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: There are potentially multiple endpoints that could satisfy the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 满足条件的服务终结点可能有多个。

trans-unit.source: The method returns the first one encountered in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 该方法会返回在集合中找到的第一个满足条件的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: If you need to find all of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects that satisfy the specified criteria, use one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要查找所有满足指定条件的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 对象，则可使用任一 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contractType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contractType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服务终结点的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a service endpoint with a specified address from the collection of service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务终结点集合的一个带有指定地址的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> of the specified address or <see langword="null" /> if none was found.
trans-unit.target: 第一个满足指定地址条件的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />，如果找不到，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: There are potentially multiple endpoints that could satisfy the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 满足条件的服务终结点可能有多个。

trans-unit.source: The method returns the first one encountered in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 该方法会返回在集合中找到的第一个满足条件的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: If you need to find all of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects that satisfy the specified criteria, use one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要查找所有满足指定条件的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 对象，则可使用任一 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="address" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="address" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> for the contract of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的协定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a service endpoint with a specified namespace and contract name from the collection of service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务终结点集合中的一个带有指定命名空间和协定名称的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> with the specified namespace and contract name or <see langword="null" /> if none was found.
trans-unit.target: 第一个满足指定命名空间和协定名称条件的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />，如果找不到，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: There are potentially multiple endpoints that could satisfy the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 满足条件的服务终结点可能有多个。

trans-unit.source: The method returns the first one encountered in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 该方法会返回在集合中找到的第一个满足条件的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: If you need to find all of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects that satisfy the specified criteria, use one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要查找所有满足指定条件的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 对象，则可使用任一 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of contract for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服务终结点的协定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> for the binding of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的绑定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a service endpoint of a specified contract type and with a specified binding name and namespace from the collection of service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务终结点集合中的一个满足指定协定类型条件且带有指定绑定命名和命名空间的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> of the specified contract type and binding name and namespace or <see langword="null" /> if none was found.
trans-unit.target: 第一个满足指定协定类型条件且带有指定绑定命名和命名空间的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />，如果找不到，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: There are potentially multiple endpoints that could satisfy the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 满足条件的服务终结点可能有多个。

trans-unit.source: The method returns the first one encountered in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 该方法会返回在集合中找到的第一个满足条件的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: If you need to find all of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects that satisfy the specified criteria, use one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要查找所有满足指定条件的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 对象，则可使用任一 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contractType" /> or <paramref name="bindingName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contractType" /> 或 <paramref name="bindingName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> for the contract of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的协定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> for the binding of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的绑定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first service endpoint with the specified contract name and namespace and binding name and namespace from the collection of service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 返回在服务终结点集合中找到的第一个带有指定的协定名称、协定命名空间、绑定命名和绑定命名空间的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> with the specified binding and contract names and namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 第一个带有指定的绑定名称、绑定命名空间、协定名称和协定命名空间的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />。

trans-unit.source: There are potentially multiple endpoints that could satisfy the criteria.
trans-unit.target: 满足条件的服务终结点可能有多个。

trans-unit.source: The method returns the first one encountered in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 该方法会返回在集合中找到的第一个满足条件的服务终结点。

trans-unit.source: If you need to find all of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects that satisfy the specified criteria, use one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要查找所有满足指定条件的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> 对象，则可使用任一 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.FindAll%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contractName" /> or <paramref name="bindingName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contractName" /> 或 <paramref name="bindingName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of all the service endpoints that satisfy specific criteria.
trans-unit.target: 返回满足特定条件的所有服务终结点的集合。

trans-unit.source: If you only need to find the first <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that satisfies the specified criteria, use one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您仅需要查找第一个满足指定条件的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>，则请使用任一 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of contract for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服务终结点的协定的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of all the service endpoints for a specified type of service.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定服务类型的所有服务终结点的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> that contains service endpoints of the specified type or the empty collection if none is found.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定类型的服务终结点的类型 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />，如果找不到，则为空。

trans-unit.source: If you only need to find the first <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that satisfies the specified criteria, use one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您仅需要查找第一个满足指定条件的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>，则请使用任一 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contractType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contractType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" /> for the service.
trans-unit.target: 该服务的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of all the service endpoints for a specified service name.
trans-unit.target: 返回满足指定服务名称条件的所有服务终结点的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> that contains service endpoints with the specified contract name and namespace or the empty collection if none is found.
trans-unit.target: 包含带有指定协定名称和命名空间的服务终结点的类型 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />，如果找不到，则为空。

trans-unit.source: If you only need to find the first <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> that satisfies the specified criteria, use one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您仅需要查找第一个满足指定条件的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>，则请使用任一 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpointCollection.Find%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="contractName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="contractName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the item should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，应在该位置插入项。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> item to insert at the specified <c>index</c>.
trans-unit.target: 应在指定 <c>index</c> 处插入的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> 项。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将一项插入集合中指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the virtual <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%28System.Int32%2C%600%29> method defined in the base class and is provided to do input validation that ensures `null` values are not inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可重写基类中定义的虚拟 <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.InsertItem%28System.Int32%2C%600%29> 方法，此方法用于进行输入验证，以确保不会将 `null` 值插入集合中。

trans-unit.source: It is not intended to be called by users.
trans-unit.target: 用户不可调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is greater than the number of items contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大于集合中所包含的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="item" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to replace.
trans-unit.target: 待替换元素的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The new value for <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> item at the specified <c>index</c>.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <c>index</c> 处的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> 项的新值。

trans-unit.source: Replaces the element in the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 替换集合中指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the virtual <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%28System.Int32%2C%600%29> method defined in the base class and is provided to do input validation that ensures `null` values are not inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可重写基类中定义的虚拟 <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection%601.SetItem%28System.Int32%2C%600%29> 方法，此方法用于进行输入验证，以确保不会将 `null` 值插入集合中。

trans-unit.source: It is not intended to be called by users.
trans-unit.target: 用户不可调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is greater than the number of items contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大于集合中所包含的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="item" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="item" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。
